EmailTemplate.name: VNS_GA12-008.020212
EmailTemplate.subject: GA12-008 - Microsoft Critical Security Bulletin - April 2012
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
POSTED: 04-25-12
Dear Clients,
Microsoft has released four (4) Critical Security Updates for the month of April, 2012. The vulnerabilities discussed in this bulletin involve Microsoft Windows and other Microsoft products.
You may access this advisory via the MyVisiNet Support site under Documentation | Tech Advisories | Microsoft Advisories | 2012.
Sincerely,
Tony Vardiman Technical Services Frontline Supervisor Direct: 858.799.7441 l Mobile: 619.816.7100 Fax: 858.799.7010 l Support: 800.847.4223
